description: Type the reading for vocabulary words in the HSK 3 word list.

deck.question: 阿姨
deck.comment: maternal aunt, step-mother, childcare worker, nursemaid, woman of similar age to one's parents (term of address used by child), CL:個

deck.question: 啊
deck.comment: modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent

deck.question: 愛好
deck.comment: to like, to take pleasure in, keen on, fond of, interest, hobby, appetite for, CL:個

deck.question: 把
deck.comment: to hold, to contain, to grasp, to take hold of, handle, particle marking the following noun as a direct object, classifier for objects with handle, classifier for small objects: handful

deck.question: 搬
deck.comment: to move, to shift, to remove, to transport, to apply indiscriminately, to copy mechanically

deck.question: 班
deck.comment: team, class, squad, work shift, ranking, CL:個, classifier for groups

deck.question: 半
deck.comment: half, semi-, incomplete, (after a number) and a half

deck.question: 辦法
deck.comment: means, method, way (of doing sth), CL:條,個

deck.question: 幫忙
deck.comment: to help, to lend a hand, to do a favor, to do a good turn

deck.question: 包
deck.comment: to cover, to wrap, to hold, to include, to take charge of, to contract (to or for), package, wrapper, container, bag, to hold or embrace, bundle, packet, CL:個,隻

deck.question: 北方
deck.comment: north, the northern part a country, China north of the Yellow River

deck.question: 被
deck.comment: quilt, by, (indicates passive-voice clauses), (literary) to cover, to meet with

deck.question: 比較
deck.comment: to compare, to contrast, comparatively, relatively, quite, comparison

deck.question: 必須
deck.comment: to have to, must, compulsory, necessarily

deck.question: 變化
deck.comment: change, variation, to change, to vary, CL:個

deck.question: 表示
deck.comment: to express, to show, to say, to state, to indicate, to mean

deck.question: 表演
deck.comment: play, show, performance, exhibition, to perform, to act, to demonstrate, CL:場

deck.question: 冰箱
deck.comment: icebox, freezer cabinet, refrigerator, CL:臺,個

deck.question: 才
deck.comment: a moment ago, just now, (preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until, (followed by a numerical clause) only

deck.question: 參加
deck.comment: to participate, to take part, to join

deck.question: 草
deck.comment: grass, straw, manuscript, draft (of a document), careless, rough, CL:棵,撮,株,根

deck.question: 層
deck.comment: layer, stratum, laminated, floor (of a building), storey, classifier for layers, repeated, sheaf (math.)

deck.question: 差
deck.comment: to differ from, to fall short of, lacking, wrong, inferior

deck.question: 成績
deck.comment: achievement, performance records, grades, CL:項,個

deck.question: 出現
deck.comment: to appear, to arise, to emerge, to show up

deck.question: 除了
deck.comment: besides, apart from (... also...), in addition to, except (for)

deck.question: 春
deck.comment: spring (time), gay, joyful, youthful, love, lust, life

deck.question: 詞語
deck.comment: word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases), term (e.g. technical term), expression

deck.question: 聰明
deck.comment: acute (of sight and hearing), clever, intelligent, bright, smart

deck.question: 打算
deck.comment: to plan, to intend, to calculate, plan, intention, calculation, CL:個

deck.question: 帶
deck.comment: band, belt, girdle, ribbon, tire, area, zone, region, CL:條, to wear, to carry, to take along, to bear (i.e. to have), to lead, to bring, to look after, to raise

deck.question: 擔心
deck.comment: anxious, worried, uneasy, to worry, to be anxious

deck.question: 當然
deck.comment: only natural, as it should be, certainly, of course, without doubt

deck.question: 地
deck.comment: -ly, structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

deck.question: 低
deck.comment: low, beneath, to lower (one's head), to let droop, to hang down, to incline

deck.question: 地方
deck.comment: area, place, space, room, territory, CL:處,個,塊

deck.question: 冬
deck.comment: sound of beating a drum, onomatopoeia for rat-a-tat etc

deck.question: 東
deck.comment: east, host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest), landlord

deck.question: 短
deck.comment: short or brief, to lack, weak point, fault

deck.question: 段
deck.comment: paragraph, section, segment, stage (of a process), classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc

deck.question: 鍛鍊
deck.comment: to engage in physical exercise, to work out, to toughen, to temper

deck.question: 多麼
deck.comment: how (wonderful etc), what (a great idea etc), however (difficult it may be etc)

deck.question: 而且
deck.comment: (not only ...) but also, moreover, in addition, furthermore

deck.question: 發燒
deck.comment: to have a high temperature (from illness), to have a fever

deck.question: 方便
deck.comment: convenient, to help out, to make things easy for people, convenience, suitable, having money to spare, (euphemism) to go to the toilet

deck.question: 放
deck.comment: to release, to free, to let go, to put, to place, to let out, to set off (fireworks)

deck.question: 放心
deck.comment: to feel relieved, to feel reassured, to be at ease

deck.question: 分
deck.comment: to divide, to separate, to allocate, to distinguish (good and bad), part or subdivision, fraction, one tenth (of certain units), unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm, minute, a point (in sports or games), 0.01 yuan (unit of money)

deck.question: 附近
deck.comment: (in the) vicinity, nearby, neighboring, next to

deck.question: 複習
deck.comment: variant of 復習, to revise, to review, revision

deck.question: 敢
deck.comment: to dare, daring, (polite) may I venture

deck.question: 感冒
deck.comment: to catch cold, (common) cold, CL:場,次

deck.question: 根據
deck.comment: according to, based on, basis, foundation, CL:個

deck.question: 跟
deck.comment: heel, to follow closely, to go with, to marry sb (of woman), with, towards, as (compared to), from (different from), and (in addition to)

deck.question: 更
deck.comment: more, even more, further, still, still more

deck.question: 關
deck.comment: mountain pass, to close, to shut, to turn off, to concern, to involve

deck.question: 關心
deck.comment: to care for sth, caring, concerned

deck.question: 關於
deck.comment: pertaining to, concerning, regarding, with regards to, about, a matter of

deck.question: 過去
deck.comment: (in the) past, former, previous, to go over, to pass by

deck.question: 害怕
deck.comment: to be afraid, to be scared

deck.question: 花
deck.comment: flower, blossom, CL:朵,支,束,把,盆,簇, fancy pattern, florid, to spend (money, time)

deck.question: 畫
deck.comment: to draw, picture, painting, CL:幅,張

deck.question: 壞
deck.comment: bad, spoiled, broken, to break down

deck.question: 檢查
deck.comment: inspection, to examine, to inspect, CL:次

deck.question: 見面
deck.comment: to meet, to see sb, CL:次

deck.question: 講
deck.comment: to speak, to explain, to negotiate, to emphasise, to be particular about, as far as sth is concerned, speech, lecture

deck.question: 腳
deck.comment: foot, leg, base, kick, CL:雙,隻

deck.question: 角
deck.comment: angle, corner, horn, horn-shaped, unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, CL:個

deck.question: 接
deck.comment: to receive, to answer (the phone), to meet or welcome sb, to connect, to catch, to join, to extend, to take one's turn on duty, to take over for sb

deck.question: 節目
deck.comment: program, item (on a program), CL:臺,個,套

deck.question: 結婚
deck.comment: to marry, to get married, CL:次

deck.question: 結束
deck.comment: termination, to finish, to end, to conclude, to close

deck.question: 解決
deck.comment: to settle (a dispute), to resolve, to solve, to dispose of, to dispatch

deck.question: 借
deck.comment: to lend, to borrow, by means of, to take (an opportunity)

deck.question: 經常
deck.comment: day to day, everyday, daily, frequently, constantly, regularly, often

deck.question: 經過
deck.comment: to pass, to go through, process, course, CL:個

deck.question: 舊
deck.comment: old, opposite: new 新, former, worn (with age)

deck.question: 決定
deck.comment: to decide (to do something), to resolve, decision, CL:個,項, certainly

deck.question: 刻
deck.comment: quarter (hour), moment, to carve, to engrave, to cut, oppressive, classifier for short time intervals

deck.question: 口
deck.comment: mouth, classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc), classifier for bites or mouthfuls

deck.question: 老
deck.comment: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity, old (of people), venerable (person), experienced, of long standing, always, all the time, of the past, very, outdated, (of meat etc) tough

deck.question: 瞭解
deck.comment: to understand, to realize, to find out

deck.question: 樓
deck.comment: house with more than 1 story, storied building, floor, CL:層,座,棟

deck.question: 馬
deck.comment: horse, CL:匹pi, horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess, knight in Western chess

deck.question: 馬上
deck.comment: at once, right away, immediately, on horseback (i.e. by military force)

deck.question: 帽子
deck.comment: hat, cap, (fig.) label, bad name, CL:頂

deck.question: 明白
deck.comment: clear, obvious, unequivocal, to understand, to realize

deck.question: 拿
deck.comment: to hold, to seize, to catch, to apprehend, to take

deck.question: 奶奶
deck.comment: (informal) grandma (paternal grandmother), (respectful) mistress of the house, CL:位

deck.question: 難
deck.comment: difficult (to...), problem, difficulty, difficult, not good

deck.question: 難過
deck.comment: to feel sad, to feel unwell, (of life) to be difficult

deck.question: 努力
deck.comment: great effort, to strive, to try hard

deck.question: 爬山
deck.comment: to climb a mountain, to mountaineer, hiking, mountaineering

deck.question: 普通話
deck.comment: Mandarin (common language), Putonghua (common speech of the Chinese language), ordinary speech

deck.question: 騎
deck.comment: to ride (an animal or bike), to sit astride

deck.question: 其他
deck.comment: other, the others, else, other than (that person), in addition to the person mentioned above

deck.question: 奇怪
deck.comment: strange, odd, to marvel, to be baffled

deck.question: 清楚
deck.comment: clear, distinct, to understand thoroughly, to be clear about

deck.question: 認為
deck.comment: to believe, to think, to consider, to feel

deck.question: 認真
deck.comment: conscientious, earnest, serious, to take seriously, to take to heart

deck.question: 如果
deck.comment: if, in case, in the event that

deck.question: 上網
deck.comment: to be on the internet, to stretch a net (in a sports game or for covering sth), to be netted (of fish)

deck.question: 生氣
deck.comment: angry, mad, offended, animated, to get angry, to be enraged, to take offense, animation

deck.question: 使
deck.comment: to make, to cause, to enable, to use, to employ, to send, to instruct sb to do sth, envoy, messenger

deck.question: 瘦
deck.comment: thin, to lose weight, (of clothing) tight, (of meat) lean, (of land) unproductive

deck.question: 叔叔
deck.comment: father's younger brother, uncle, Taiwan pr.

deck.question: 樹
deck.comment: tree, CL:棵, to cultivate, to set up

deck.question: 刷
deck.comment: to brush, to paint, to daub, to paste up, to skip class (of students), to fire from a job

deck.question: 條
deck.comment: strip, item, article, clause (of law or treaty), classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

deck.question: 同意
deck.comment: to agree, to consent, to approve

deck.question: 為了
deck.comment: in order to, for the purpose of, so as to

deck.question: 位
deck.comment: position, location, place, seat, classifier for people (honorific), classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)

deck.question: 習慣
deck.comment: habit, custom, usual practice, to be used to, CL:個

deck.question: 洗澡
deck.comment: to bathe, to take a shower

deck.question: 先
deck.comment: early, prior, former, in advance, first

deck.question: 相信
deck.comment: to be convinced (that sth is true), to believe, to accept sth as true

deck.question: 像
deck.comment: to resemble, to be like, to look as if, such as, appearance, image, portrait, image under a mapping (math.)

deck.question: 小心
deck.comment: to be careful, to take care

deck.question: 新鮮
deck.comment: fresh (experience, food etc), freshness, novel, uncommon

deck.question: 信
deck.comment: letter, mail, CL:封, to trust, to believe, to profess faith in, truthful, confidence, trust, at will, at random

deck.question: 興趣
deck.comment: interest (desire to know about sth), interest (thing in which one is interested), hobby, CL:個

deck.question: 需要
deck.comment: to need, to want, to demand, to require, requirement, need

deck.question: 選擇
deck.comment: to select, to pick, choice, option, alternative

deck.question: 要求
deck.comment: to request, to require, to stake a claim, to ask, to demand, CL:點

deck.question: 一定
deck.comment: surely, certainly, necessarily, fixed, a certain (extent etc), given, particular, must

deck.question: 一樣
deck.comment: same, like, equal to, the same as, just like

deck.question: 以後
deck.comment: after, later, afterwards, following, later on, in the future

deck.question: 以為
deck.comment: to believe, to think, to consider, to be under the impression

deck.question: 一般
deck.comment: same, ordinary, so-so, common, general, generally, in general

deck.question: 一邊
deck.comment: one side, either side, on the one hand, on the other hand, doing while

deck.question: 一直
deck.comment: straight (in a straight line), continuously, always, from the beginning of ... up to ..., all along

deck.question: 影響
deck.comment: an influence, an effect, to influence, to affect (usually adversely), to disturb, CL:股

deck.question: 用
deck.comment: to use, to employ, to have to, to eat or drink, expense or outlay, usefulness, hence, therefore

deck.question: 又
deck.comment: (once) again, also, both... and..., and yet, (used for emphasis) anyway

deck.question: 遇到
deck.comment: to meet, to run into, to come across

deck.question: 願意
deck.comment: to wish, to want, ready, willing (to do sth)

deck.question: 越
deck.comment: to exceed, to climb over, to surpass, the more... the more

deck.question: 站
deck.comment: station, to stand, to halt, to stop, branch of a company or organization, website

deck.question: 著急
deck.comment: to worry, to feel anxious, Taiwan pron.

deck.question: 照顧
deck.comment: to take care of, to show consideration, to attend to, to look after

deck.question: 隻
deck.comment: classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc

deck.question: 終於
deck.comment: at last, in the end, finally, eventually

deck.question: 種
deck.comment: abbr. for 物種, genus, race, seed, breed, species, strain, kind, type, has guts (i.e. courage), nerve, classifier for types: kind, sort, classifier for languages

deck.question: 祝
deck.comment: to wish, to express good wishes, to pray, (old) wizard

deck.question: 注意
deck.comment: to take note of, to pay attention to

deck.question: 最近
deck.comment: recent, recently, these days, latest, soon, nearest (of locations), shortest (of routes)

deck.question: 作業
deck.comment: school assignment, homework, work, task, operation, CL:個, to operate

deck.question: 作用
deck.comment: to act on, to affect, action, function, activity, impact, result, effect, purpose, intent, to play a role, corresponds to English -ity, -ism, -ization, CL:個
